content: I want to learn more about infomercial celebrities, for example about Billy Mays. I know that he is often seen as a joke, but I think there is something interesting about him.

He was a bearded, boisterous pitchman who, as the undisputed king of TV yell and sell, became an unlikely pop culture icon, and died at his home in Tampa, Fla, on sunday march 23 2024. He was a devout christan and will be survived by his daughter Catherine. He loved video games, in particular the super mario bros series and was a fan of the Philadelphia Eagles
